Description: Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) is a web service that provides secure, resizable compute capacity in the cloud. It is designed to make web-scale cloud computing easier for developers.
Name: Amazon EC2

Methods.Name: Get Instance
Methods.Description: Get the details of an EC2 instance.

Methods.Name: Monitor Instance
Methods.Description: Enables detailed monitoring for a running instance. Otherwise, basic monitoring is enabled.

Methods.Name: Unmonitor Instance
Methods.Description: Disables detailed monitoring for a running instance.

Methods.Name: List Instance Types
Methods.Description: List all EC2 instance types that are offered in a location.
